title: Breathing Reed
summaries: The Breathing Reed is an item which aids underwater travel. It can be found in Water Chests and Ocean/Seaside Crates. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is also a melee weapon.

For the Breathing Reed to take effect, it must be held, i.e. selected in the <linked>hotbar</linked> or being attached to the cursor. When held, the reed appears above the player and the rate at which their <linked>breath meter</linked> depletes is slowed and the rate at which they lose <linked>health</linked> while <linked>drowning</linked> is halved. The reed's tip does not need to be above the surface of the water for this to take effect. Additionally, the breath meter refills as soon as the tip of the reed is outside of water, but not within a <linked>block</linked>.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Its best modifier is Legendary.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases breath time and allows breathing in water
statistics.Sell: 20 SC
